participant_1.name: Alex Rivera
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, enjoys finding joy in simple things, but struggles with personal connections.
participant_1.background: I like my job, but I don't have a lot of family support. I would love to enjoy a sweet treat as a reward after my long drive to work. I want a place where I can practice my dancing. i work for the railroad. i am a closet cannibal.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and driven, always looking for ways to keep busy and make the most out of life.
participant_2.background: I try to go out for a walk or do something to take my mind off things. I'm not a weather person. i also eat too much french fries. i am currently studying at union college and want to be an english teacher. I am an aspiring male model while my mother looks after my grandmother.

content.text: I'm doing well! I'm a railroad worker, and I love my job but I don't have a lot of family support.
Oh that's too bad! I'm a model and I want to be an English teacher, I also live with my mother who takes care of my grandmother.
That's interesting! I love to dance and wish I had a place to practice.
I love to go out for a walk or do something to take my mind off things. Do you like the weather?
I'm not a weather person myself. Would you like to meet up sometime and practice dancing together?
That sounds like fun! I'd love to. When are you free?
This week is good for me. I'm free on Wednesday.
Wednesday sounds good! What time works for you?
That works for me! I'll see you then!
